title: Impact of supply shift when D is perfectly elastic

content.question: If the demand for product X is perfectly elastic and the supply of product X decreases, which of the following will occur in the market for X ?

choices.label: Total revenue will remain the same.
Quantity demanded will exceed quantity supplied.
Quantity supplied will exceed quantity demanded.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
